Unable to reproduce on lates code stream.
There are multiple guards in the code. The only explaination is that the editor 
has been closed (the source viewer's widget was null) but not yet disposed 
(source viewer was not null). This situation is unlikely because there are 
async execs or different threads involved in changing preferences.
